title: Textile, ca. 1840
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
A. Warp: 62cm (24 1/4in.) Weft: 68cm (26 3/4in.)
Right selvedge only. 
B. Warp: 64cm (25 1/8in.). Weft74cm (29 1/8in. )
Right selvedge only. 
Height of repeat: 42cm.
description: Two scenes of (a) children blowing bubbles and (b) playing pick-up sticks and building a house of cards. The scenes are separated by architectural features and by foliage.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1840.
ca. 1840. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-210-a,b.
